column4: What are you trying to do? I use usb serial cable for cisco devices. works fine for me
I have had problems with USB serial adapters before. I was hoping to avoid any non-plug and play device
I am trying to connect to a 2800 series. Is the device typically /dev/ttyUSB0 ?
Yup! That's it. I think it depends on how many USB devices you have plugged in
